Debate in Parliament | Source | Edit (learn more) (last edited 20 Oct 2013 by henare)

All Votes Cast - sorted by constituency

Representatives for which their vote in this division differed from the majority vote of their party are marked in red. Also shows which Representatives were ministers at the time of this vote. You can also see every eligible Representative including those who did not vote in this division.

Sort by: Name | Constituency | Party | Vote

About the Project

The Public Whip is brought to you by the not-for-profit OpenAustralia Foundation. It is based on the UK site of the same name.

If you'd like to talk to us about the project, please email us.

OpenAustralia, Election Leaflets, Right To Know and Planning Alerts.
The Public Whip is a not-for-profit, open source, project. Get the source code.
